options.text: Rising CO₂ may be linked to temperature, but correlation does not prove causation

questions.question: Correlation Insight Task - Health Data Analysis
questions.description: A graph shows that people who exercise more tend to have higher heart-health scores. However, the data also varies across diet, age, and sleep quality.

leftSide.text: Healthy people are more likely to exercise
People who exercise also eat better or sleep more
There is no connection at all

questions.question: Your class average rose sharply after a new teaching method was introduced. Before concluding it works, you decide to check the details below.
questions.optionInstruction: Rank the following verification steps from most important (1) to least (4):

options.text: Examine the sample size and previous scores.
Control for other variables (teacher, topic, difficulty).
Check if improvement is consistent across all groups.
